attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The national minimum wage shouldbe increase to £7 an hour. People who work in the places that even the wealthy people need such as supermarkets, if it wasnt for us who work there where would everyone go shopping. Its a very important part of everyones life so why should we struggle on low wages when everyone one out there needs us

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
